TopicTitle: [Patch 1] Engine thrust display stays at 0 for most engines [Fixed!]

Articles.Content:
With the first version of the game every engine has a working thrust readout in the parts manager.  Since the patch this seems to not be the case.  Most engines are reading 0 thrust even though they are working fine.  I have not found any workaround other than manual estimation based on the stats of the part.

Edited April 17, 2023 by Jason_25
This looks to be fixed now but I did not see it in the change logs.  Good job.
